verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of Nehemiah <S%H5166><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hacaliah. <S%H2446><s%> Now it happened <S%H1961><s%> in the month <S%H2320><s%> Chislev, <S%H3691><s%> [in] the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> while I was in Susa <S%H7800><s%> the capitol, <S%H1002><s%>

that Hanani, <S%H2607><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of my brothers, <S%H251><s%> and some men <S%H376><s%> from Judah <S%H3063><s%> came; <S%H935><s%> and I asked <S%H7592><s%> them concerning <S%H5921><s%> the Jews <S%H3064><s%> who had escaped <S%H6413><s%> [and] had survived <S%H7604><s%> the captivity, <S%H7628><s%> and about <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> to me, "The remnant <S%H7604><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> in the province <S%H4082><s%> who <S%H834><s%> survived <S%H7604><s%> the captivity <S%H7628><s%> are in great <S%H1419><s%> distress <S%H9567><s%> and reproach, <S%H2781><s%> and the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> is broken <S%H6555><s%> down <S%H6555><s%> and its gates <S%H8179><s%> are burned <S%H3341><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>"

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when I heard <S%H8085><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> I sat <S%H3427><s%> down <S%H3427><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> and mourned <S%H56><s%> for days; <S%H3117><s%> and I was fasting <S%H6684><s%> and praying <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

And I said, <S%H559><s%> "I beseech <S%H577><s%> Thee, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> and awesome <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> who preserves <S%H8104><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> for those who love <S%H157><s%> Him and keep <S%H8104><s%> His commandments, <S%H4687><s%>

let Thine ear <S%H241><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> be attentive <S%H7183><s%> and Thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> open <S%H6605><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am praying <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee now, <S%H3117><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night, <S%H3915><s%> on behalf <S%H5921><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> Thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> confessing <S%H3034><s%> the sins <S%H9128><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against Thee; I and my father's house <S%H1004><s%> have sinned. <S%H2398><s%>

"We have acted <S%H2254><s%> very <S%H2254><s%> corruptly <S%H2254><s%> against Thee and have not kept <S%H8104><s%> the commandments, <S%H4687><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou didst command <S%H6680><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

"Remember <S%H2142><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou didst command <S%H6680><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'If you are unfaithful <S%H4603><s%> I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> you among the peoples; <S%H5971><s%>

but if you return <S%H7725><s%> to Me and keep <S%H8104><s%> My commandments <S%H4687><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them, though <S%H518><s%> those of you who have been scattered <S%H5080><s%> were in the most <S%H7097><s%> remote <S%H7097><s%> part <S%H7097><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> I will gather <S%H6908><s%> them from there <S%H8033><s%> and will bring <S%H935><s%> them to the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have chosen <S%H977><s%> to cause My name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell. <S%H7931><s%>'

"And they are Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> and Thy people <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Thou didst redeem <S%H6299><s%> by Thy great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and by Thy strong <S%H2389><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"O <S%H577><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> I beseech <S%H577><s%> Thee, may Thine ear <S%H241><s%> be attentive <S%H7183><s%> to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> and the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> who delight <S%H2655><s%> to revere <S%H3372><s%> Thy name, <S%H8034><s%> and make <S%H6743><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> successful <S%H6743><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> and grant <S%H5414><s%> him compassion <S%H7356><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>" Now I was the cupbearer <S%H9307><s%> to the king. <S%H4428><s%>
